description.en_US: Take a gamble and roll a number from 1 to 9 for different attack results.
A blazing thrust of fire piercing through enemies in front of you.
description.de_DE: Ein Feuerstoß, der deine Feinde vor dir durchbohrt.
description.zh_CN: 使用一团猛烈的火焰攻击你前方的敌人，造成\c[3]燃烧\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ja_JP: 前方の敵を貫く、燃え盛る炎の攻撃。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.ko_KR: 눈앞에 있는 적을 관통하며 불에 태우는 공격입니다.<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]
description.zh_TW: 使用一團猛烈的火焰攻擊你前方的敵人，造成\c[3]燃燒\c[0]效果。<<A<<[CHANGED 2018/03/14]

description.en_US: Attack with a powerful flail that does heavy damage to all enemies it hits. The tip does more damage than the chain.
Attack with a powerful flail that does heavy damage to all enemies it hits. The tip does more damage than the chain.
Strike an enemy with a quick thrust. If hit, three shadow sparks will surround and attack the enemy after some time.
